attributes.review: First off this app always crashes and takes way too much storage this Orange has so much money yet he canâ€™t even make a decent app. But another thing is that I didnâ€™t know a app can bring toxicity in my life . A few days after I downloaded this app my phone started glitching and eventually shut off . So i couldnâ€™t use my phone for about 2 days. Finally my phone turned back on and the first thing I saw when I unlocked it is a picture of an orange rat looking man and on the picture it said â€œtrump 2020â€ . I was extremely terrified. So I went to my camera roll to find the picture that I had before on my wallpaper and I could not believe my eyes when I saw a bunch of pictures of oranges which also had a Cheeto puff look to it and out of nowhere I started cry and it felt like my eyes had just gotten shampoo and pepper in it and later my eyes started bleeding. My parents werenâ€™t home it was only me and my grandma. so my poor 200 year old grandmother who is barely able to move her fingers had to get a Uber and rush to the ER . The doctors had diagnosed me with chronic Cheeto puff illness which is clearly un normal and told me if I start seeing army of orange rats with a huge Cheeto puff leading it that I must come back . I then went back home and right when I opened my door thatâ€™s exactly what I saw . The terrifying army started throwing oranges at me and I had no choice but to feed my grandma to the army (rip grannyğŸ’”) . What happened next was just the icing on the cake ğŸ˜Œ, the army ate my grandma really quick and started chasing me to the ER . Thankfully the doctors saved me and later they had to do surgery in my eyes and brain for some random reason . It turns out my brain was orange and they had to replace it with a normal brain (I would like to thank the kind woman named Stancey who gave her brain to me that was very much appreciated) . On my way back home I still heard the rats in my head chanting â€œvote for trumpâ€ . I still sometimes see orange little rats come out of my wall and I have even woken up next to one . I am obviously not fully recovered from this traumatic experience and I have hired a great psychologist which at first looked like mr. Cheeto orange Donald himself and it was really scary but the look starts wearing off on her as I get better. Over all I definitely do not recommend this app due to my crazy experience and everyone elseâ€™s experiences that I have seen .
